title: No Other Love
lyrics:
[Intro: John Legend]
No other love
No other touch
Gimme, gimme oh so much
Turn me on, turn me on
[Verse 1: John Legend]
Won't you please get out of my head?
Get back into my bed now
Come kiss me, come with me
'Cause I can't hardly sleep without you
Can't stop thinkin' 'bout you, girl
I want you, I need you
[Pre-Chorus: John Legend]
And I'm ready for love (I'm)
Ready for us to lose control?
Oh, you know and I know that
[Chorus: John Legend & Estelle]
No other love
No other touch
Gimme, gimme oh so much
Turn me on, turn me on
No other kiss
No one like this
Feeling that I can't resist
Turn me on, turn me on, turn me on

[Verse 2: John Legend]
I had my share of lovers
But there is no other girl, your special, now let's go
'Cause now I want you more than ever
Want to do whatever now
To keep you, I need you
[Pre-Chorus: John Legend]
And I'm ready for love, (
I'm
) ready for us to lose control?
Oh, you know and I know that
[Chorus: John Legend & Estelle]
No other love
No other touch
Gimme, gimme oh so much
Turn me on, turn me on
No other kiss
No one like this
Feeling that I can't resist
Turn me on, turn me on, turn me on
[Verse 3: Estelle, 
John Legend & Estelle
]
(I say) I say your turnin' me on now-ow
Say your turning me oh-oh-oh, on
Say your turning me on with your smile, to your lips
To the words of this song ah know
I used to say I was too young, now I'm grown up
But I put you where you need that strong
Real goodie, good loving
Stevie Wonder said it's been so long
And I'ma give it if you need it, are you ready to receive it?
Boy I-I-I-I-I (wanna give you some love)
(I) I wanna give you some love and affection
You got my attention
See I-I-I-I-I'm ready for love, (I'm) ready for us to loose control
Oh you know, and I know that

[Chorus: John Legend & 
Estelle
]
No other love (
No other love
)
No other touch (
Other touches
)
Gimme, gimme oh so much
Turn me on, (
Turn me on
) turn me on
No other kiss (
No other kiss
)
No one like this
Feeling that I can't resist
Turn me on (
Turn me on
) turn me on turn me on
